name: Margasoft Corporation
tag_list: market-research, market-research-automation, corporate-business-process-automation, corporate-management-applications, market-research-software, software, software-development
overview:
Margasoft is a US-based company specializing in market research and business process automation. It was founded by two software engineers with cumulative experience of more than 25 years which gives the company a unique perspective on enterprise software development process. The company builds its software products by following highly iterative custom software development process that is heavily based on Agile principles. Margasoft has constantly been on the cutting edge of technology employing the latest software development methodologies and best practices.

The list of Margasoft’s customers includes but is not limited to Countrywide, ITG, Bank of America and Johnson & Johnson.

Since 2011 Margasoft has focused on building software products for Market Research companies. Software suite designed and implemented by Margasoft targets the following three main aspects of Market Research process: data acquisition, data analysis and data presentation. For each of the corresponding Market Research phases Margasoft offers a separate product designed to address specific needs of that particular phase. Currently, Margasoft partners with one of the leading companies in Market Research, Added Value Group (member of Kantar, WPP) to solve its market research data analysis and presentation automation software needs.

Margasoft is headquartered in Los Angeles, CA and also has a subsidiary development site in Yerevan, Armenia. Currently, Margasoft employs over 40 employees globally.
